Package com.ImportedClasses.BookClassPack

Class Sound

java.lang.Object
com.ImportedClasses.BookClassPack.SimpleSound
com.ImportedClasses.BookClassPack.Sound
public class Sound
extends SimpleSound
Class that represents a sound. This class is used by the students to extend the capabilities of SimpleSound. Copyright Georgia Institute of Technology 2004
Author:
Barbara Ericson ericson@cc.gatech.edu
